query: What are the top leaderboard scores in Santa 2025 Kaggle Christmas tree packing competition and what techniques did they use?

results.title: ANSWER
results.text: The top leaderboard score in the Santa 2025 Kaggle Christmas Tree Packing competition was 70.84, achieved by a participant using a method involving bounded optimization techniques ([kaggle.com](https://www.kaggle.com/code/daniil1423/santa-2025-full-public-best-score), published on 01/07/2026). The specific techniques used include optimization algorithms, likely related to bounding methods, but detailed strategies are not explicitly described in the available sources.
